subject: Football
College Athletics
Cable Television
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: If the NFL Network’s stance does not change, many Rutgers and Kansas State fans will not be able to see their teams play in the Texas Bowl on Dec. 28.
